description: Lists all participants in a specified stage session.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: ID of the session within the stage.

nested_items.name: participants
nested_items.description: List of the matching participants (summary information only).

nested_items.name: participantId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for this participant, assigned by IVS.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: Customer-assigned name to help identify the token; this can be used to link a participant to a user in the customer's own systems. This can be any UTF-8 encoded text. This field is exposed to all stage participants and should not be used for personally identifying, confidential, or sensitive information.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: Whether the participant is connected to or disconnected from the stage.

nested_items.name: firstJoinTime
nested_items.description: ISO 8601 timestamp (returned as a string) when the participant first joined the stage session.

nested_items.name: published
nested_items.description: Whether the participant ever published to the stage session.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more participants than maxResults, use nextToken in the request to get the next set.
